text: Stephen "Steve" A. McMillan (born July 6, 1941) is an American politician. He is a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from the 95th District, serving since 1982. He is a member of the Republican party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:Alabama Democrats Category:1941 births Category:21st- century American politicians
title: Steve McMillan (politician)
